name: Fate of the Norns Futhark Rune
name_original: Fate of the Norns Futhark Rune
description:
The Fate of the Norns games are played using the Rune Game System (RGS). Traditionally RGS uses physical rune tiles which are moved over a playmat- until now! We are pleased to announce that RGS has now gone digital and can be played using a smart phone, tablet or laptop. It features:

- Same stunning artwork found in the Fate of the Norns books
- Up to 6 playmats that can be used concurrently
- Customizable Essence bags
- The Void rune as well as Destiny and damage rune paths
- Fully tactile experience, drag and drop, tap to rotate runes, etc
- Condition zones with 4 intensity counters
- Save your playmat states
